onceSaleMarkedAsPaid: Once it's marked as paid, you can't edit the sale anymore.
oncePurchaseMarkedAsPaid: Once purchase is marked as paid, you can't edit it anymore.
customerName: Customer name is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
customerSurname: Customer surname is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
phoneNumber: Phone number is required. It must be E.164 format. Example: +12345678901.
addressLine1: Address line 1 is required. You can type the address and choose the proper one for yourself. Autocomplete on browsers may not work properly.
addressLine2: Address line 2 is required. The length must be 3-120. Here you can write your apartment number, floor, etc.
supplierName: Supplier name is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
supplierSurname: Supplier surname is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
productName: Product name is required. The length must be between 2 and 100 characters.
productDescription: Product description is optional. The length must be between 3 and 100 characters.
productType: Product type is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
productSalePrice: Product sale price is required. It must min 0.01 and max 1000000.
productPurchasePrice: Product purchase price is required. It must min 0.01 and max 1000000.
title: Title is required. The length must be between 2 and 100 characters.
description: Description is optional. The length must be between 3 and 100 characters.
saleCustomer: Customer must be selected. If you don't have any customers, you must create one.
saleProduct: Product must be selected. If you don't have any products, you must create one. If the product is out of stock, you must create a purchase.
saleQuantity: Quantity is required. It must be minimum 1. The maximum is the product's stock.
purchaseSupplier: Supplier must be selected. If you don't have any suppliers, you must create one.
purchaseProduct: Product must be selected. If you don't have any products, you must create one.
purchaseQuantity: Quantity is required. It must be minimum 1 and maximum 999.
profileName: Name is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
profileSurname: Surname is required. The length must be between 2 and 30 characters.
profileEmail: Email can't be updated. If you want to change it, you must contact the support team.
profilePhoneNumber: Phone number is optional. It must be E.164 format. Example: +12345678901.
language: You can choose the language you want to use. The default language is English.
profileTimezone: You can choose the timezone you want to use. The default timezone is UTC.
profileCurrency: You can choose the currency you want to use. The default currency is USD. This currency will be used for all calculations.
newPassword: New password is the password you want to use. It must be between 6 and 18 characters. It must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number. It can't be the same as the current password.
confirmPassword: Confirm password is the same as the new password.
companyName: Company name is required. The length must be between 2 and 64 characters.
companyWebsite: Company website is optional. The format should be valid. Ex. https://www.example.com.
companyDescription: Company description is optional. Maximum length is 1000 characters.
companiesField: Please select the company. The company is required.
